DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate bioequivalence bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogens tablet produce use current manufacturing process bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogen tablet produce use new manufacturing process
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogen Tablets In Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy , postmenopausal woman age 35 70 year weigh least 50 kg ( approx . 110 lb ) . At least 6 month spontaneous amenorrhea ( folliclestimulating hormone level 39 mIU/mL great ) . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day , ability abstain 5 day . Exclusion Criteria Women amenorrhea start 54 year age . A history active presence clinically important medical disease . Use oral estrogen , progestin , androgen , SERMcontaining drug product within 30 day receive study drug .
